com.ibm.streamsx.topology.builder

Class BOperator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.streamsx.topology.builder.BJSONObject
      • com.ibm.streamsx.topology.builder.BOperator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BMarkerOperator, BOperatorInvocation

    public class BOperator
extends BJSONObject
    JSON representation. Operator: params: Object of Parameters, keyed by parameter name. outputs: Array of output ports (see BStream) inputs: Array in input ports type: connections: array of connection names as strings Parameter value: Value of parameter.

        public void addConfig(java.lang.String key,
